Package ePortfolio

Class MutualFund

  • java.lang.Object
    • ePortfolio.Investment
      • ePortfolio.MutualFund
  • public class MutualFund
extends Investment
    MutualFund.java is a class file that represents an individual mutual fund investment as part of the investment portfolio
    Since:
    2021-11-06

        Calculates the payment received after selling investment
        Parameters:
